title: League of Legends Launcher Update stuck on 32% and 0 Applied Patches.
body:
This happens every update, and every time this happens, I have to restart my client and waste another 200MB of my precious and expensive bandwidth... 'tis sad day for me.

EDIT: I'm also on Mac by the way, OS X Version 10.9.1.

replies.body: Have you tried running it with advanced privileges from the get-go?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=RT9KyLGo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-16T01:04:19.376+0000)
>
> Have you tried running it with advanced privileges from the get-go?

Sorry?
